title: Gorgeous Dre on “American Pimp” Documentary, Becoming a Street Czar, Talking to Trump & More
description:
Sharp and Gorgeous Dre chop it up about their street days, life lessons, and get emotional about the loss of their friend and more.

---
00:00 Intro
0:42 - Dre's mom was a h*e and his dad was a p*mp
1:44 - Getting paid 15k for being a technical advisor on “American Pimp” documentary
5:38 - Catching a case during the filming of the documentary, the Hughes Brothers getting clearance to come to the jail and film him
8:34 - Leaving the game while in prison but never really leaving the game, using it in every part of life
17:14 - Going through things building character but also can make you bitter
19:37 - Having a conquer mindset, America being a empire, getting Trump to call him, getting a big check cut by the government for his police reform
23:30 - Black people are letting entertainment be the most important thing to them
27:29 - Changing your community, passing police accountability law in Washington state, the only one that exist in the country
33:28 - People thinking information isn’t spendable so they don’t want it
35:04 - God choosing the people that others consider the least to humble them
36:09 - The first girl he connected with being a Jehovah witness who was looking for a pimp, not being mad at the game
40:39 - RIP Kenny Red


---
